steps.intro: Welcome to the Dice Throne 1v1 tutorial. Reduce your opponent to 0 Health before they do the same to you.
steps.stats: This panel shows your resources: Health (starts at 50) and CP (starts at 2, max 15). Most healing caps at starting Health +10.
steps.phases: Turn order lives here: Upkeep â†’ Income â†’ Main 1 â†’ Offensive Roll â†’ Defensive Roll â†’ Main 2 â†’ Discard. The first player skips Income on their first turn.
steps.playerBoard: This is your player board: ability slots and upgrades live here, and ready abilities can be activated from this area.
steps.tipBoard: This tip board shows your hero reference and ability requirements; you can expand or collapse it anytime.
steps.dice: Your dice tray. You may roll up to 3 times each turn and lock dice you want to keep.
steps.rollButton: Use â€œRollâ€ to start rolling. When youâ€™re satisfied or out of rolls, move to confirm.
steps.confirmButton: Confirm locks the result so you can pick a skill. If you want another roll, donâ€™t confirm yet.
steps.abilities: Highlighted abilities are available to use. Pick one to begin attack resolution.
steps.hand: Your hand lives here. In Main phases you can play action cards or upgrades, or sell cards for CP.
steps.discard: This is the discard pile. Drag a card here to sell it for +1 CP.
steps.statusTokens: Status effects and tokens live here. Spend Evasive/Taiji/Purify at the right time; pay 2 CP before offense to remove Knockdown.
steps.advance: Use the Next Phase button to move forward. Enter offensive roll and then roll dice.
steps.resolveAttack: After choosing an offensive ability, click â€œResolve Attackâ€ to apply damage and open defense if needed.
steps.purifyUse: You gained a Purify token! Click the Purify token on the left to open the purify panel, select Knockdown, and click "Confirm" to remove it.
steps.innerPeace: Your hand has Inner Peace â€” play it to gain 2 Taiji tokens.
steps.playSix: Your hand has Play Six â€” use it during offensive roll to set a die to 6.
steps.meditation2: Your hand has Meditation II â€” drag it onto the Meditation ability slot to upgrade.
steps.finish: That's the 1v1 core flow. Try activating abilities, playing cards, and defeating your opponent!
steps.opponentDefense: Your opponent is rolling for defense. The defender auto-selects a defensive ability and rolls.
steps.cardEnlightenment: Cards can turn the tide: play action or upgrade cards in Main phases, and dice modifier cards during Offensive Roll. Next up is your opponent's turn.
steps.aiTurn: Your opponent's turn begins â€” watch how they play cards and attack.
steps.knockdownExplain: The opponent played Palm Strike, inflicting Knockdown on you! Knockdown forces you to skip offensive roll, but you can remove it with Purify.
steps.enlightenmentPlay: Play the Enlightenment card from your hand to roll 1 die. Rolling a Lotus face grants Taiji, Evasive, and Purify tokens.
